job_description:
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to troubleshoot complex issues.
• Currently pursuing a Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering or a related field.
• Demonstrated attention to detail and strong organizational skills.
• Previous internship or project experience in a related field.
• Experience with PLC programming and a willingness to learn.
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
• New College Grad - Engineer, Electrical Design – FPGA/ASICBoise, Idaho, United States of AmericaPosted 20 days ago Ability to work effectively in a team environment and collaborate with team members from different subject areas.
• Knowledge of data extraction, analysis, and reporting methodologies.
